                                                Architecture

Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: With the Bachelor of Arts degree, students acquire the qualification to work in all phases of the HOAI (fee structure for architects and engineers) in architecture and planning offices thus specialised. In addition to the traditional fields of work, there are job opportunities in related areas such as real estate, building management, construction management, project management and project development, visualisation and animation.

deadlines_info.Bewerbungsfrist Nicht-EU-Ausländer: Bei der Hochschule erfragen!

overview_info.Subject:
Das Architecture gehört zum Studienbereiche Architecture der Fächergruppe Engineering Sciences.Weitere Informationen zum Studienbereich Architecture.Weitere Informationen zur Fächergruppe Engineering Sciences.
                                                Architecture

Target group: The programme is aimed at graduates in the field of architecture and has an application-oriented, practice-oriented profile with a focus on design and construction, from idea to detail. The focus of the course is on applied design and project work, which is accompanied by a large number of elective modules. Students thus have an opportunity to consolidate their knowledge in individually chosen key areas.

First professionally qualifying degree (Bachelor's or Diploma) in the field of
Architecture. Applicants from degree courses related to architecture can
admission will be granted subject to an examination on the minimum requirements of the course contents.

overview_info.Subject:
Das Architecture gehört zum Studienbereiche Architecture der Fächergruppe Engineering Sciences.Weitere Informationen zum Studienbereich Architecture.Weitere Informationen zur Fächergruppe Engineering Sciences.
                                                Architecture
overview_info.Areas of Concentration: Representation,  Design and Communication, Integrated projects + designing, Social Economic and Historical Principles, Architecture Theory, Further study project: Sustainability + Demographic Development, Further study project: Energy-Efficient Redevelopment of Existing Properties, Business start-up + Company Management, Facility and Project Management

Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: The Architecture course is designed as a project course. Subjects of various subject groups are combined into larger 'integrated projects'. Students therefore experience the reciprocity and interdependency of the technical, theoretical and design aspects of the various subjects right from the outset. The degree course can alternatively be studied as a cooperative course with a partner company (https://www.hs-kl.de/hochschule/referate/wirtschaft-und-transfer/kosmo-kooperatives-studienmodell/kosmo-fuer-studierende/).

overview_info.Areas of Concentration: Design and Construction Strategies, Project Management and Property Economics, Energy Optimised Building, Preservation of Historic Monuments,  Planning of Existing Properties, Corporate Architecture

Target group:
Architecture in the broader sense is a product of human culture that nourishes humans and helps them to survive. The Masters degree course continues the focus after the Bachelors on this responsible role.

The Faculty of Architecture therefore offers five specialisations covering all current trends in architecture and urban planning.
Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: Proof of degree course-related aptitude required.

                                                Architecture
overview_info.Areas of Concentration: Design, Town Planning, Construction and Technique, Theory of architecture, Presentation and Design

Target group: The Master's degree at the Jade Hochschule provides students with an international qualification to work as a freelance architect in accordance with the UIA regulations (International Union of Architects). In addition, the Master's degree course also provides admission to higher level civil service and leads to entitlement to continue with a doctorate.
Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: The course can be completed on a part-time basis on request. The Departmental Council determines the corresponding guidelines.

Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: The Master's degree course is a vital element of architectural training in the two-stage course system. The 7-semester Bachelor's degree course with integrated practical semester and the 4-semester consecutive Master's course "Building in Existing Structures" meet the requirements of the Federal Chamber of Architects and the International Union of Architects (UIA).

overview_info.Areas of Concentration: Town Planning and Construction Materials

Target group: Prospective students with Bachelor's or Diplom degrees as per the admissions criteria
Annotation of the Higher Education Insti: In the career-integrated master's degree in Architecture and Environment, the necessary specialist knowledge of ecological construction is imparted. This degree course is characterised by the team-oriented, interdisciplinary way of working. After successfully completing your studies, you will be able to apply scientific methods and to develop holistic solutions to complex tasks.Graduation with 90 credits
